main event: Mr. and Mrs. William Gay observed three bright glowing objects moving across the sky in formation, maneuvering erratically at high speed.
interesting points: The sighting occurred over Albuquerque, New Mexico on October 8, 1954., The objects were described as bright and glowing., The duration of the observation was approximately 15 minutes., Witnesses included airport traffic controllers and civilians., The objects were reported to be moving at high speeds with no sound.
sighted object: three bright glowing objects in the sky
witness description: Mr. and Mrs. William Gay along with other eyewitnesses including airport traffic controllers.
